helloworld.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 /*********************************************************************
2  * Demo.cpp
3  *
4  * This file shows the basics of setting up a mex file to work with
5  * Matlab. This example shows how to use 2D matricies. This may
6  *
7  * Keep in mind:
8  * <> Use 0-based indexing as always in C or C++
9  * <> Indexing is column-based as in Matlab (not row-based as in C)
10  * <> Use linear indexing. [x*dimy+y] instead of [x][y]
11  *
12  * For more information, see my site: www.shawnlankton.com
13  * by: Shawn Lankton
14  *
15  ********************************************************************/
16 //#include <gcop/utils.h>
17 //#include <gcop/so3.h>
18 #include <gcop/kalmanpredictor.h>
19 #include <gcop/kalmancorrector.h>
20 //#include <gcop/unscentedpredictor.h>
21 //#include <gcop/unscentedcorrector.h>
22 #include <gcop/point3d.h>
23 #include <gcop/point3dgps.h>
24 #include <fstream>
25 
26 
27 using namespace std;
28 using namespace gcop;
29 using namespace Eigen;
30 
31 typedef KalmanPredictor<Point3dState, 6, 3, Dynamic> Point3dKalmanPredictor;
32 typedef KalmanCorrector<Point3dState, 6, 3, Dynamic, Vector3d, 3> Point3dGpsKalmanCorrector;
33 
34 int main(int argc, char **argv)
35 {
36 
37  //declare variables
38  //double *a, *b, *c;
39  vector<double> a, c;//Vectors
40  int dimx, dimy;
41  int i,j;
42 
43  //Open File
44  if(argc != 2)
45  {
46  cout<<"Usage ./helloworld [DIR_NAME]"<<endl;
47  return -1;
48  }
49  string filename = string(argv[1]) + "/vrpn.dat";
50  string outfilename = string(argv[1]) + "/posfilt.dat";
51  ifstream ifile;
52  ofstream ofile;
53  cout<<"File name: "<<filename<<endl;
54  ifile.open(filename.c_str());//Open file
55  ofile.open(outfilename.c_str());
56  char dummy[500];
57  ifile.getline(dummy,500);//To remove the first line
58  //delete dummy;//Delete the pointer
59  //Now on we can read the file into doubles:
60  double temp;
61  while(ifile>>temp)//Till we can read every number into
62  {
63  a.push_back(temp);
64  }
65  cout<<"Done Reading File"<<endl;
66  //Divide vector length by 10 to number of rows:
67  dimy = a.size()/10;
68  dimx = 10;
69 
70 
71  //GCOP Stuff:
72  Point3d point3d;//Point system
73 
74  point3d.sa = 0.5;
75 
76  Point3dGps gps;//Gps Sensor
77  gps.sxy = 0.01;//1cm
78  gps.sz = 0.01;//1cm
79 
80  Point3dKalmanPredictor kp(point3d);
81  Point3dGpsKalmanCorrector kc(point3d, gps);//Corrector needs gps
82 
83 //Initialization:
84  Point3dState xs;//Initial state
85  xs.q<<a[1], a[2], a[3];//Initial guess taken from the first measurement
86  xs.P.topLeftCorner<3,3>().diagonal().setConstant(0.05); // q Stdeviation etc
87  xs.P.bottomRightCorner<3,3>().diagonal().setConstant(0.05); // v Initially large stdeviation
88 
89  Vector3d u(0, 0, 0); // no inputs Constant velocity model
90  Vector3d z;//Measurement holder
91 
92  //Start Filtering:
93  for(j=1;j<dimy;j++)//Going through all rows
94  {
95  Point3dState x;//Prediction
96  double dt = (a[j*dimx] - a[dimx*(j-1)])/1e9;//First column
97  double t = (a[j*dimx] - a[0])/1e9;
98  kp.Predict(x, t, xs, u, dt);
99 
100  z<<a[dimx*j +1 ], a[dimx*j+2], a[3+dimx*j];//Measurement
101  cout << "z=" << z.transpose() << endl;
102 
103  //Point3dState xcorr;//Corrected State
104  kc.Correct(xs, t, x, u, z);//Update the initial state
105  ofile<<xs.q[0]<<"\t"<<xs.q[1]<<"\t"<<xs.q[2]<<"\t"<<xs.v[0]<<"\t"<<xs.v[1]<<"\t"<<xs.v[2]<<"\t"<<x.q[0]<<"\t"<<x.q[1]<<"\t"<<x.q[2]<<"\t"<<x.v[0]<<"\t"<<x.v[1]<<"\t"<<x.v[2]<<"\t"<<endl;
106  cout << "Measured position: " << z.transpose() << endl;
107  cout << "Estim position: " << xs.q << endl;
108 
109  cout << "Estim velocity: " << xs.v << endl;
110 
111  cout << "P=: " << xs.P << endl;
112 
113  //c[(j-1)] = xs.q[0]; c[(dimy-1) + (j-1)] = xs.q[1]; c[2*(dimy-1) + (j-1)] = xs.q[2];//Posn
114  //c[3*(dimy-1) + (j-1)] = xs.v[0]; c[4*(dimy-1) + (j-1)] = xs.v[1]; c[5*(dimy-1) + (j-1)] = xs.v[2];//Vel
115  //Can also return covariance etc if needed
116  }
117  return 0;
118 }
